result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Salvatore C Fiorito in court with attorney Peter Michael Masana.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State states recs.  Atty Masana agrees and NC plea entered.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty and sentences.

Ct 1:  NC - Battery
Probation for one year
Conditions of probation:
$443.00 costs/surcharges to be paid to Clerk of Court's Office
Restitution per stipulation filed to be paid at the rate of at least $100/month beginning on or before 5/1/2016
If restitution paid in full, then DE may be released early from probation per agent (parties would need to file a motion)

15CM638
Ct 1:  Dismissed/read-in

Defendant Salvatore C Fiorito in court with attorney Peter Michael Masana.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is not resolved.   Stands Mute, Court enters Not Guilty Plea, set for trial.  Bond continues.

Pre-trial conference at 01-08-2016 09:30 am.
Return date at 01-22-2016 01:00 pm.

Defendant Salvatore C Fiorito appeared by video means with Attorney Raabe. Prosecuting Atty Sue Mueller appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Masana would likely represent on this matter as well.   Defendant waives reading of complaint. Advised rights to an attorney.  State request cash bond with further conditions. Attorney Raabe argues bond.  Defendant is employed.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date. $50.00 CASH bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  Absolute sobriety.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 8, 2016 at 09:30 am.  Return date scheduled for January 22, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
